Title: Assassins
Writer: Lilly Wachowski (story), Lana Wachowski (story), Lilly Wachowski (screenplay), Lana Wachowski (screenplay), Brian Helgeland (screenplay)
Actors: Sylvester Stallone, Antonio Banderas, Julianne Moore, Anatoli Davydov
Plot: Robert Rath is a seasoned hitman who just wants out of the business with no back talk. But, as things go, it ain't so easy. A younger, peppier assassin named Bain is having a field day trying to kill said older assassin. Rath teams up with a computer hacker named Electra to defeat the obsessed Bain.
Production: Evansgideon/Lazar, Donner/Schuler-Donner, Silver Pictures, Warner Brothers
